Hi all,

 I am surprised this has not been shown yet as it was immediately apparent that 1.2.1 has a shadow issue. It is much more visible when using scatterer but it is still visible in stock.

 It was said that there was a change to the FOV in this version and I am curious as to whether this is the cause of this ugly new bug. I will submit a bug report also. Here is a video so you can see what I mean. And as I said, if you have scatterer it is much more pronounced.

 

Here is the bug report:  http://bugs.kerbalspaceprogram.com/issues/13176
Sorry folks, my bad, this issue existed before, @sal_vager hi mate, can you close this? Thanks.
